title: Earth from Space
description: A view of Earth as seen from space, showcasing the blue oceans, green and brown landmasses, and white clouds.

title: Earth's Interior Structure
description: An illustration showing a cross-section of the Earth, highlighting the inner core, outer core, mantle, and crust. The inner core is depicted in orange, surrounded by the outer core, which is represented with arrows indicating convection currents (red and blue arrows) that illustrate the movement of molten material.
